entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Musgrave Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:27 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 4:30 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow changing to rain overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain or rain near noon then to ice pellets or snow late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
